Hi, I'm Michelle Navarro

I'm a Senior Software Engineer based in Los Angeles with expertise in full stack development, frontend engineering, and AI-powered solutions. I build scalable, user-centric products that blend cutting-edge technology with thoughtful design.

About

With over six years of professional experience, I've worked on projects ranging from generative AI tools that drive millions in ad spend, to intuitive dashboards that help publishers understand their audiences. My background spans React, Redux, Node.js, Java Spring Boot, MySQL and microservices.

Outside of work, I'm deeply interested in the intersection of technology, psychology, and design.

MN

Work

Generative AI Prompt Helper

Built and scaled a React + Spring Boot application that powers AI-driven content generation tools, processing millions of requests and driving significant ad revenue growth.

Notification Flow & A/B Testing Infrastructure

Productized, scaled, and documented a Node.js web crawler and notification system that improved user engagement through intelligent A/B testing and personalized content delivery.

Analytics & Behavior Tracking

Implemented comprehensive data pipelines from frontend events to backend analytics, enabling data-driven decision making and user behavior insights across multiple platforms.
